## PagingInitializerOptions interface

Base paging initializer options for every paging initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PagingInitializerOptions extends PluginOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [prefix](./grid.paginginitializeroptions.prefix.md) | <code>string</code> | Prefix that is applied to params storing page and items per page |
